00036 #include "PACC/Math/Vector.hpp"
00037 #include "PACC/Util/StringFunc.hpp"
00038 #include <stdexcept>
00039 
00040 using namespace std;
00041 using namespace PACC;
00042 
00064 string Vector::read(const XML::ConstIterator& inNode)
00065 {
00066     if(!inNode) throw runtime_error("Vector::read() nothing to read!");
00067     try {
00068         // try the standard matrix format
00069         Matrix::read(inNode);
00070         if(mCols != 1 && (mCols != 0 || mRows != 0)) 
00071             throwError("Vector::read() must a single column!", inNode);
00072         if(inNode->isDefined("size")) {
00073             int lSize = String::convertToInteger(inNode->getAttribute("size"));
00074             if((int)mRows != lSize) throwError("Vector::read() invalid 'size' attribute!", inNode);
00075         }
00076     } catch(const runtime_error& inError) {
00077         // try the deprecated format
00078         clear();
00079         for(XML::ConstIterator lChild = inNode->getFirstChild(); lChild; ++lChild) {
00080             if(lChild->getType() == XML::eData && lChild->getValue() == "Float") {
00081                 string lValue;
00082                 if((lValue = lChild->getAttribute("v")) != "" || (lValue = lChild->getAttribute("value")) != "") push_back(String::convertToFloat(lValue));
00083                 else if(lChild->getFirstChild() && lChild->getFirstChild()->getType() == XML::eString) push_back(String::convertToFloat(lChild->getFirstChild()->getValue()));
00084             }
00085         }
00086         mCols = 1;
00087         mRows = vector<double>::size();
00088         if(inNode->isDefined("size")) {
00089             int lSize = String::convertToInteger(inNode->getAttribute("size"));
00090             if((int)mRows != lSize) throwError("Vector::read() invalid size attribute", inNode);
00091         }
00092         if(inNode->isDefined("name")) mName = inNode->getAttribute("name");
00093     }
00094     return mName;
00095 }
00096 
00102 void Vector::write(XML::Streamer& outStream, const string& inTag) const
00103 {
00104     PACC_AssertM(mCols == 1, "Vector::write() invalid vector!");
00105     outStream.openTag(inTag, false);
00106     if(mName != "") outStream.insertAttribute("name", mName);
00107     outStream.insertAttribute("size", mRows);
00108     if(size() > 0) {
00109         ostringstream lContent;
00110         lContent.precision(mPrec);
00111         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < mRows; ++i) {
00112             if(i != 0) lContent << ";";
00113             lContent << (*this)[i];
00114         }
00115         outStream.insertStringContent(lContent.str());
00116     }
00117     outStream.closeTag();
00118 }
00119 
00122 ostream& PACC::operator<<(ostream &outStream, const Vector& inVector)
00123 {
00124     XML::Streamer lStream(outStream);
00125     inVector.write(lStream);
00126     return outStream;
00127 }
00128 
00132 XML::Document& PACC::operator>>(XML::Document& inDocument, Vector& outVector)
00133 {
00134     XML::Iterator lNode = inDocument.getFirstDataTag();
00135     outVector.read(lNode);
00136     inDocument.erase(lNode);
00137     return inDocument;
00138 }
